Bootstrap 3 Password Strength Meter Example - Popover

jQuery(document).ready(function () {
    "use strict";
    var options = {};
    options.ui = {
        bootstrap3: true,
        showPopover: true,
        showErrors: true,
        showProgressBar: false
    };
    options.rules = {
        activated: {
            wordTwoCharacterClasses: true,
            wordRepetitions: true
        }
    };
    $(':password').pwstrength(options);
});
